description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The famous "SHOOTING CHICKEN" is revived here after 2 years. It's now reborn as a totally sidescroll, action shooting game, and it's even crazier than ever with a new type of enemy as well as the chicken from the previous vesion. Fight against the cloud of chickens coming at you, and compete for scores with your friends!
